summary: Functional test suite for Conan's Apple toolchain integration with Xcode and Xcodebuild, covering client setup, missing SDK handling, building projects with various SDKs, shared and static library targets, Xcode dependency generation, component processing, build configuration handling, naming conventions, architecture specifications, and proper escaping of definitions in generated Xcode project files.
business_intent: Ensure that Conan reliably integrates with the Apple Xcode toolchain, providing correct package management, dependency generation, and build configuration support for Apple platforms, thereby enabling developers to build C++ projects with Xcode without issues.
